import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Header from '../components/Header' import { AppContext } from '../context/context' import axios from 'axios' const Alert = ({ history }) => { const { loginUser, fetchData } = React.useContext(AppContext) const [virus, setVirus] = useState('') const [location, setLocation] = useState('') useEffect(() => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('loginUser')) !user && history.push('/') }, [history, loginUser]) return ( <>

setUsername(e.target.value)} required />
